name: Dungeon Platformer (Demo)
description:
I got bored and wanted to make a new project to test some ideas on how I want to program my games. Such as organization, player controls, and camera controls. The game was made using Flowlab, and the code will be available here:

https://flowlab.io/game/view/1752438

This game was made by using free assets found across the itch.io store, which all I used are listed below.

Asset Packs

  • Environment:  https://rottingpixels.itch.io/platformer-dungeon-tileset
  • Hero: https://oco.itch.io/medieval-fantasy-character-pack
  • Ghoul: https://lionheart963.itch.io/wizard
  • Skeleton: https://astrobob.itch.io/animated-pixel-art-skeleton
  • Key: https://itch.io/queue/c/849155/sprite-packs?game_id=367853
  • Door: https://itch.io/queue/c/849155/sprite-packs?game_id=367934
  • Torches: https://gianmansuper.itch.io/pixel-torches
  • Skull UI: https://ironchestgames.itch.io/rpg-items-for-pico-8

Any art or sound used that's not from this list is provided from Flowlab.
